name: begin_design_import_from_file
description: Creates a design import job from a file upload.

file_import_parameters.description: Metadata included in the Import-Metadata header:

title_base64.description: REQUIRED. Base64-encoded design title (max 50 unencoded characters).

name: check_file_import_progress
description: Retrieves the status and result of a design import job.

file_import_job_id.description: The ID of the design import job.

name: check_media_upload_status
description: Retrieves the status and result of an asset upload job.

upload_task_identifier.description: The ID of the asset upload job.

name: enumerate_directory_contents
description: Lists items (folders, designs, images) within a specified folder.

target_folder_identifier.description: The ID of the folder to list items from.

content_type_filter.description:
Comma-delimited list of item types to filter by.
Valid values: "folder", "design", "image".

sorting_preference.description:
Field used to sort the results.
Valid values:
- "created_ascending"
- "created_descending"
- "modified_ascending"
- "modified_descending" (default)
- "title_ascending"
- "title_descending"

name: enumerate_thread_replies
description: Lists replies from a specific thread on a design.

page_size.description: Max number of replies to return (default: 50, min: 1, max: 100).

name: fetch_asset_metadata
description: Retrieves metadata for a specific asset by its ID.

media_identifier.description: The ID of the asset to retrieve.

name: fetch_autofill_task_status
description: Retrieves the status and results of an autofill job by its ID.

autofill_job_identifier.description: The ID of the autofill job to retrieve.

name: fetch_brand_template_by_id
description: Retrieve a brand template by its ID.

template_identifier.description: The ID of the brand template.

name: fetch_discussion_thread
description: Retrieves a specific comment thread from a design.

discussion_thread_identifier.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve.

name: fetch_project_pages
description: Retrieves pages from a design, with support for pagination.

target_design_id.description: The ID of the design to retrieve pages from.

pagination_start_index.description:
The index of the first page to return (1-based). Default is 1.
Min: 1, Max: 500.

items_per_page_count.description:
The number of pages to return. Default is 50.
Min: 1, Max: 200.

name: fetch_user_team_info
description: Retrieves the team-related user information for the given user ID.

name: find_brand_templates
description: List brand templates with optional filters and sorting.

search_keyword.description: Search term to filter brand templates by title.

name: generate_canva_artwork
description: Creates a new design with specified design type, asset, and title.

artwork_format.description:
The design type to use with the following key:
- "preset": Accepted values for preset are:
- doc
- whiteboard
- presentation
- canvas
- banner
- flyer
- social
- video
- presentation
- infographic
- poster

initial_asset_identifier.description:
The ID of the asset (e.g., image) to include in the design.
Must be a non-empty string.

artwork_name.description: Title of the design. Must be 1–255 characters.

name: get_url_import_status
description: Retrieves the status and result of a URL import job.

url_import_job_identifier.description: The ID of the URL import job.

name: initiate_design_autofill_task
description: Creates an asynchronous job to autofill a design from a brand template with input data.

source_template_identifier.description: ID of the input brand template.

rows.description: List of rows, where each row contains:

autofill_payload.description: Dictionary of data fields to autofill. Each key maps to a field object with:

new_design_title.description: Optional title for the autofilled design. If not provided, defaults to the template's title.

name: initiate_design_export_process
description: Creates a design export job.

source_design_identifier.description: REQUIRED. The ID of the design to export.

export_specifications.description: REQUIRED. Dictionary specifying export format options:

quality.description:
SOMETIMES REQUIRED.
    - For JPG: Integer between 1–100 (compression quality).
    - For MP4: One of the following values:
        "horizontal_480p", "horizontal_720p", "horizontal_1080p", "horizontal_4k",
        "vertical_480p", "vertical_720p", "vertical_1080p", "vertical_4k".

size.description: Paper size for PDFs. One of: "a4", "a3", "letter", "legal".

lossless.description: For PNG. If True, export without compression. Default: True.

transparent_background.description: For PNG. If True, enables transparency. Default: False.

as_single_image.description: If True, export multipage design as a single image. Default: False.

name: initiate_design_import_from_url
description: Creates a design import job using a public URL.

imported_design_title.description: REQUIRED. The title for the imported design (1–255 characters).

source_file_url.description: REQUIRED. Publicly accessible file URL (1–2048 characters).

file_content_type.description: MIME type of the file (1–100 characters). If not provided, it will be auto-detected.

name: make_new_directory
description: Creates a new folder with the given name under the specified parent folder.

directory_name.description: Name of the new folder (1–255 characters).

containing_folder_id.description: ID of the parent folder (1–50 characters).

name: modify_asset_details
description: Updates the metadata of an existing asset and returns the updated asset.

target_asset_id.description: The ID of the asset to update.

new_asset_name.description: New name for the asset (max 50 characters).

new_asset_tags.description: New list of tags for the asset (max 50 tags).

name: permanently_remove_asset
description: Deletes an asset by its ID.

asset_to_remove_id.description: The ID of the asset to delete.

name: post_reply_to_thread
description: Adds a reply to a comment thread on a design.

related_design_id.description: The ID of the design the thread belongs to.

parent_thread_id.description: The ID of the thread to reply to.

reply_content.description: The plaintext message body of the reply. Mentions use [user_id:team_id].

name: query_design_export_status
description: Retrieves the status and results of a design export job.

name: remove_directory_and_contents
description: Deletes a folder and all its contents recursively.

folder_to_delete_id.description: ID of the folder to delete.

name: rename_directory
description: Updates the name of a folder and its modification timestamp.

target_directory_id.description: ID of the folder to update.

updated_directory_name.description: New name for the folder (1–255 characters).

name: retrieve_artwork_metadata
description: Retrieves metadata for a single design.

artwork_identifier.description: The ID of the design. Must be a non-empty string.

name: retrieve_brand_template_schema
description:
Gets the dataset definition of a brand template. If the brand template contains autofill data fields,

this returns an object with the data field names and the type of data they accept.

name: retrieve_directory_details
description: Retrieves metadata for a specific folder.

directory_identifier.description: ID of the folder to retrieve.

name: retrieve_specific_reply
description: Retrieves a specific reply from a thread on a design.

containing_thread_id.description: The ID of the thread the reply belongs to.

reply_identifier.description: The ID of the reply to retrieve.

name: retrieve_user_profile_data
description: Retrieves the profile data for the given user ID.

name: search_canva_creations
description: Lists user-owned and shared designs, optionally filtered and sorted.

search_keyword.description: Search term to filter designs by title (max length: 255).

access_level_filter.description:
Filter by ownership - "any", "owned", or "shared".
Defaults to "any".

name: start_media_upload_process
description: Creates an asset upload job and returns its initial status.

asset_filename.description: The name of the asset being uploaded.

preview_image_url.description: URL to the thumbnail image representing the asset.

name: start_new_discussion_thread
description: Creates a new comment thread on a design.

target_design_id.description: The ID of the design to add a comment to.

comment_text.description: The plaintext body of the comment. User mentions must follow the format [user_id:team_id].

assigned_user_identifier.description:
Optional ID of the user to assign the comment to.
The user must be mentioned in the comment message.
